item.title: My story I want to share
item.description: I’ve never attended church regularly. For many years I had known that there is God, but I didn’t know who He is, what He did for me, or what Jesus did for me. I didn’t know Him. I didn’t think I needed Him in my life. I thought I was good on my own. I’ve made a lot of bad things that I feel shame and embarrassment now. I was lying, I was hurting other people (including close ones), and I was selfish.
